# RStudios Data Import Tool
```{r}
library(readr)
comma <- read_csv("~/Downloads/comma.csv", 
    col_types = cols(ht_in = col_integer(), 
        wt_lbs = col_integer()))
View(comma)
```
#exporting data
```{r}
demo <- data.frame(
  id = c("001", "002", "003", "004"),
  age = c(30, 67, 52, 56),
  edu = c(3, 1, 4, 2)
  )
```
```{r}
readr::write_csv(demo, "demo.csv")
```

```{r}
readr::write_rds(demo, "demo.rds")
```
#loading back exported data
```{r}
demo <- readr:: read_rds("demo.rds")
```
